text.section: The provisions of KRS 15.310 to 15.510, 15.530 to 15.590, and 15.990 to 15.992 do not apply to the Department of Kentucky State Police except for the certification requirement established by this chapter.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 19, effective June 26, 2007; and ch. 139, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 480, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 117, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 300, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 8, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 32. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 129, sec. 5.

metadata.lrc-note: ((6/26/2007). This section was amended by 2007 Ky. Acts chs. 85 and 139, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
